content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith

content: As a landlord, I am interested in maximizing my gains from renting out this apartment. I would like to discuss the rental price with you. What is your proposal?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I was wondering if there was a possibility to negotiate the rental price with you?
name: James Smith

content: I am open to negotiating the rental price of this apartment. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I was thinking of 1000 Euros per month, but I can consider a higher price if it makes sense for you and your business.

Additionally, I would like to make sure that the rental price is competitive in the area, as well as any potential benefits I could offer, such as a longer lease or no security deposit.
name: James Smith

content: I appreciate your interest in renting the apartment and I understand that you want a competitive price. I am open to discussing the rental price and any potential benefits that could make this arrangement beneficial for both parties. Can you tell me more about the competition in the area and any other benefit you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine
